author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the DtCalib AlCaReco stream after agreement with the DT DPG.
It solves the issue raised on several comments from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29630 due to the transition to Tasks

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l 25.0,1000.0,4.22,1001.0 -i all --ibeos -j 9 -t 9

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport foreseen
title: Drop DtCalib AlCaReco Stream
